resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106090</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106090</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207238</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Port of Entry: Immigration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kanal des Eintrages: Immigration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Port d'entrée : Immigration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porta da entrada: Immigration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Porta dell'entrata: Immigrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λιμένας της εισόδου: Μετανάστευση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acceso de la entrada: Inmigración</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a game in which the viewer assumes the role of historical detective, searching for clues in photographs and eyewitness accounts about immigrant life in America.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein Spiel, in dem der Projektor die Rolle des 
historischen Detektivs annimmt und sucht nach Anhaltspunkten in den 
Fotographien und Augenzeuge berechnet über einwandernde Lebensdauer 
in Amerika.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un jeu dans lequel le visualisateur assume le 
rôle du détective historique, recherchant des indices en 
photographies et le témoin oculaire rend compte au sujet de la vie 
immigrée en Amérique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um jogo em que o visor supõe o papel do 
detetive histórico, procurarando por indícios nas fotografias e a 
testemunha ocular explica sobre a vida immigrant em América.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un gioco in cui il visore ammette il ruolo del 
detectivo storico, cercante gli indizii in fotografie ed il testimone 
oculare spiega circa vita immigrata in America.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα παιχνίδι στο οποίο η εμφάνιση υποθέτει το 
ρόλο του ιστορικού ιδιωτικού αστυνομικού, που ψάχνει για τις 
ενδείξεις στις φωτογραφίες και τους απολογισμούς αυτοπτών 
μαρτύρων για την που έχουν μεταναστεύσει ζωή στην Αμερική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un juego en el cual el espectador asume el 
papel del detective histórico, buscando para pistas en fotografías y
el testigo presencial considera sobre vida inmigrante en América.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207238</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106090</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/port-of-entry-immigration</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
